topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55626202636872726a130200#post_55626202636872726a130200
Dude; you're mixing up philosophy and religion.

I didn't say that I agreed with the comics, rather that they were funny given the context.

It would be like making a comic about scientists insulting each other's mothers and Einstein says to the person, "your mother isn't even observable".
